trans-unit.source: Display
trans-unit.target: Display

trans-unit.source: Albumhash
trans-unit.target: Albumhash

trans-unit.source: JavaSript is needed for display of the PhotoStation album!
trans-unit.target: Es wird JavaSript für die Anzeige des PhotoStation Albums benötigt!

trans-unit.source: $PS_height: Height of PhotoStation content element.
trans-unit.target: $PS_height: Höhe des PhotoStation Content Elements.

trans-unit.source: $PS_width: Width of PhotoStation content element.
trans-unit.target: $PS_width: Breite des PhotoStation Content Elements.

trans-unit.source: $PS_bg_color: Background color of PhotoStation content element.
trans-unit.target: $PS_bg_color: Hintergrundfarbe des PhotoStation Content Elements.

trans-unit.source: $PS_padding: Width of border around images.
trans-unit.target: $PS_padding: Breite des Rahmens um die Bilder.

trans-unit.source: PhotoStation JavaScript Source File: Patched JavaScript file for Lightbox. Will only be included when constant lightbox is set!
trans-unit.target: PhotoStation JavaScript Quelldatei: Angepasste JavaScript-Datei für die Lightbox. Die Datei wird nur eingeschlossen, wenn die Konstante lightbox gesetzt ist!

trans-unit.source: PhotoStation CSS File: SCSS/CSS for PhotoStation. If you're using bootstrap_package, leave it to SCSS default file. Otherwise you may use the CSS from EXT:Resources/Public/CSS/custom.css (but you loose ability to use SCSS variables).
trans-unit.target: PhotoStation CSS File: SCSS/CSS Datei für PhotoStation. Wenn man das bootstrap_package verwendet, dann auf der Default SCSS-Datei lassen. Ansonsten das CSS von EXT:Resources/Public/CSS/custom.css verwenden, wobei man die Möglichkeit der Verwendung von SCSS Variablen verliert.

trans-unit.source: PhotoStation Server: Web server address of PhotoStation.
trans-unit.target: PhotoStation Server: Webserver Adresse von PhotoStation.

trans-unit.source: PhotoStation Server http/https switch: Switch between http/https. Lightbox will only work with https!!
trans-unit.target: PhotoStation Server http/https Schalter: Schalter zwischen http/https. Die Lightbox funktioniert nur mit https!!

trans-unit.source: PhotoStation Server string: Webpage string for PhotoStation (only change when you know what are you doing!)
trans-unit.target: PhotoStation Server string: Seitenaufruf für die PhotoStation (bitte nur ändern, wenn man wirklich weiß, was man tut!)

trans-unit.source: PhotoStation autoplay: Activate autoplay feature. Deactivate with empty string!
trans-unit.target: PhotoStation autoplay: Aktivierung des automatischen Starts. Deaktivierung durch keine Angabe!

trans-unit.source: PhotoStation link: Set a link to PhotoStation. Deactivate with empty string!
trans-unit.target: PhotoStation link: Link zur PhotoStation setzen. Deaktivierung durch keine Angabe!

trans-unit.source: PhotoStation lightbox: Activate lightbox feature. Deactivate with empty string!
trans-unit.target: PhotoStation lightbox: Aktivierung der Lightbox. Deaktivierung durch keine Angabe!

trans-unit.source: PhotoStation album description: Toggle for display of PhotoStation album description.
trans-unit.target: PhotoStation album description: Schalter zur Ausgabe der Beschreibung des PhotoStation Albums.

trans-unit.source: PhotoStation debug: Toggle for debugging. Displays settings.
trans-unit.target: PhotoStation debug: Schalter fürs Debuggen. Anzeige von settings.

trans-unit.source: Path to template root (FE).
trans-unit.target: Pfad zu den Templates (FE).

trans-unit.source: Path to template partials (FE).
trans-unit.target: Pfad zu den Template Partials (FE).

trans-unit.source: Path to template layouts (FE).
trans-unit.target: Pfad zu den Template Layouts (FE).

trans-unit.source: Default storage PID.
trans-unit.target: Voreingestellte Speicher Page-ID.

trans-unit.source: on
trans-unit.target: an

trans-unit.source: off
trans-unit.target: aus
